sentence.Network_en: "But Ian's such a simpleton", she laughed.

list.abs: I reminded of another a words : in the world again big simpletons all have an epigone !我想起了另外一句话：世界上再大的傻瓜都有一个追随者！
She represented her little brother as a simpleton ., 她把她的弟弟描绘成一个傻瓜.
He looked at me as if I were a simpleton ., 他看着我的样子就好像我是个傻子.
you big simpleton , how can anyone deceive the eye .你这个大傻瓜，谁能够骗眼睛呢？

childs will tell the parents say that own schoolbag broke a hole , or on the face contain a black mark. etc. adult body to see , they shout the " April simpleton " .小孩们会告诉父母说自己的书包破了个洞，或者脸上有个黑点．等大人俯身来看时，他们就一边喊着“四月傻瓜”。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from simple, on the pattern of surnames derived from place names ending in -ton

entry.tran: 傻瓜;呆子;容易受骗的人
entry.def: If you call someone a simpleton, you think they are easily deceived or not very intelligent.

example.ex: 'But Ian's such a simpleton', she laughed...
example.tran: “可是伊恩太傻了，”她笑着说道。

example.ex: He was a lightweight, a political simpleton.
example.tran: 他是个无名之辈，头脑简单的政客。

means.word_mean: 1. a person lacking intelligence or common sense
